<The Ancient of Days
4:
--------------------
Text: The Ancient of Days:  As noted in Gilchrist's "Life of William Blake", the design of "The Ancient of Days" was "a singular favourite with Blake and as one it was always a happiness to him to copy."
Triplets:<William Blake
5:
--------------------
Text: The Ancient of Days:  As such there are many versions of the work extant, including one completed for Frederick Tatham only weeks before Blake's death.
